org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.algebra.evaluation

Interface QueryOptimizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BindingAssigner, CompareOptimizer, ConjunctiveConstraintSplitter, ConstantOptimizer, DisjunctiveConstraintOptimizer, EmptyPatternOptimizer, FederationJoinOptimizer, FilterOptimizer, IterativeEvaluationOptimizer, OrderLimitOptimizer, OwnedTupleExprPruner, PrepareOwnedTupleExpr, QueryJoinOptimizer, QueryModelNormalizer, QueryModelPruner, QueryModelPruner, QueryMultiJoinOptimizer, QueryOptimizerList, RegexAsStringFunctionOptimizer, SameTermFilterOptimizer, SpinFunctionInterpreter, SpinMagicPropertyInterpreter

    public interface QueryOptimizer
    Interface used by EvaluationStrategys to optimize the TupleExpr prior to evaluating the query.
    Author:
    James Leigh, Arjohn Kampman
    See Also:
    QueryOptimizerPipeline
